page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content:
This survey was conducted by 10 and 11 year old pupils of Petham County Primary school and the Headteacher Mr J.P.Rose BA. {PUPILS:}Stephen & Simon Anderson,Tony Peach,Wayne Goodburn,Jonathan Benge, Christopher Brooker,Derek Sims, Rachel Hannibal,Irene Coveney,Carolyn Allen, Maria Marnham, Caroline Street, Marie Castle, Anna Silsby, Bianca Smith.
Many people helped with the work:- parents with transport to field locations, farmers who assisted us in the field and others who gave their advice and suggestions. In particular: Mr Paul Loxton Edwards JP - (Chairman, Petham Parish Council.) Mrs R. Gillies Mr M. Hood-Cree Mrs C. Hood-Cree Mr & Mrs E Maylam
